question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. baseball bat
B. baseball glove
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The baseball bat is held by the batter who is in the foreground, while the baseball glove is worn by the catcher who is positioned behind the batter and further back in the scene.
